content:
The Clippy Roadmap 2021 is out: clippy#6462

Please leave your thoughts and feedback in the PR!
@simulacrum ^ for linking in the Rust roadmap
If you want to PR against my branch that would be amazing, otherwise I will try and find some time to include it
Where should I add a link to the Clippy roadmap? prior art?
ah hm no, I think a new subsection under FAQ would be good
I just left a suggestion comment, that you can commit via the GitHub GUI. That was a bit easier for me :) https://github.com/rust-lang/rfcs/pull/3037#discussion_r545405489
I was thinking about posting a link in reddit/URLO to get some feedback if nobody is opposed
